title: Create a DFB load with cargo value between $100,001 and $250,000
description: Test Case to create a non-tabular load, set cargo value, enter offer rate, and post to TNX. Verify the load is visible in DME and TNX applications.
preconditions: Customer exists with proper cargo value settings
Office is configured with DME enabled

steps.action: Navigate to Admin and configure office preconditions
Search for customer and navigate to new load
steps.expectedResult: Customer is found and new load page is displayed

steps.action: Create a Non-Tabular load with shipper and consignee details
Click Create Load button and verify navigation to edit load page
steps.expectedResult: Load is created and edit load page is displayed

steps.action: Navigate to Carrier tab and enter offer rate
Click Post button and validate post status
Open DME application and verify load is visible
Open TNX application and verify load is visible

expectedResults: Load is visible in DME application
Load is visible in TNX application for included carriers
